mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT #{num}

SELECT c.* FROM product LEFT JOIN product_key pk ON product.id = pk.product_id LEFT JOIN compound c on c.id = pk.compound_id WHERE product.id = ${productId} AND ${searchProperty} like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

SELECT c.* FROM product LEFT JOIN product_key pk ON product.id = pk.product_id LEFT JOIN compound c on c.id = pk.compound_id LEFT JOIN odour_description od on c.id = od.compound_id WHERE product.id = #{productId} AND od.odour_description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{odourDescription}, '%') AND c.is_deleted = 0

SELECT c.* FROM product LEFT JOIN product_key pk ON product.id = pk.product_id LEFT JOIN compound c on c.id = pk.compound_id LEFT JOIN odour_threshold ot on c.id = ot.compound_id WHERE product.id = #{productId} AND ot.odour_threshold between #{low} and #{high} AND c.is_deleted = 0
